org.lazywizard.lazylib.campaign

Class MessageUtils

  • Object
    • MessageUtils

  • public class MessageUtils
extends Object
    Allows formatted, multi-line, word-wrapped sector messages
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    LazyWizard

    • Field Detail

      • LINE_LENGTH

        public static final int LINE_LENGTH
        How long a line can be before being split by showMessage(java.lang.String). This is hardcoded to a number that still looks good at very low resolutions. If you wish to have a different message length, you can use StringUtils.wrapString(java.lang.String, int) then output the results.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • showMessage

        public static void showMessage(@Nullable
                               @Nullable String preamble,
                               String message,
                               boolean indentMessage)
        Formats and word-wraps the supplied text, then outputs it as a sector message.
        Parameters:
        preamble - The header for this message, won't be indented. Can be null.
        message - The main body of text.
        indentMessage - Whether to indent each line of the main body.
        Since:
        1.0

      • showMessage

        public static void showMessage(String message)
        Formats and word-wraps the supplied text, then outputs it as a sector message.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to output.
        Since:
        1.0
